  • 类 
    类 说明
    org.elasticsearch.action.bulk.TransportSingleItemBulkWriteAction
    org.elasticsearch.action.delete.TransportDeleteAction
    org.elasticsearch.action.index.TransportIndexAction
    org.elasticsearch.common.component.AbstractComponent
    declare your own logger
    org.elasticsearch.common.geo.builders.ShapeBuilders
    this class is replaced by each builder's constructor e.g. instead of using ShapeBuilders.newMultiPoint use new MultiPointBuilder()
    org.elasticsearch.index.mapper.LegacyGeoShapeFieldMapper
    use GeoShapeFieldMapper
    org.elasticsearch.index.mapper.LegacyGeoShapeFieldMapper.DeprecatedParameters
    org.elasticsearch.index.translog.TranslogToolCli
  • 异常错误 
    异常错误 说明
    org.elasticsearch.index.engine.DeleteByQueryFailedEngineException
    Delete-by-query is removed in 2.0, but we keep this so translog can replay on upgrade.
    org.elasticsearch.index.engine.DeleteFailedEngineException
    org.elasticsearch.index.engine.IndexFailedEngineException
    org.elasticsearch.script.GeneralScriptException
    Use ScriptException for exceptions from the scripting engine, otherwise use a more appropriate exception (e.g. if thrown from various abstractions)
  • 注释类型 
    注释类型 说明
    org.elasticsearch.common.inject.assistedinject.AssistedInject
    FactoryProvider now works better with the standard @Inject annotation. When using that annotation, parameters are matched by name and type rather than by position. In addition, values that use the standard @Inject constructor annotation are eligible for method interception.
  • 字段 
    字段 说明
    org.elasticsearch.common.network.NetworkUtils.SUPPORTS_V6
    transition mechanism only, do not use
    org.elasticsearch.index.analysis.SynonymTokenFilterFactory.ignoreCase
    this property only works with tokenizer property
    org.elasticsearch.index.analysis.SynonymTokenFilterFactory.tokenizerFactory
    This filter tokenize synonyms with whatever tokenizer and token filters appear before it in the chain in 6.0.
    org.elasticsearch.index.IndexSettings.INDEX_TTL_DISABLE_PURGE_SETTING
  • 方法 
    方法 说明
    org.elasticsearch.action.admin.cluster.state.ClusterStateResponse.getTotalCompressedSize()
    org.elasticsearch.action.admin.indices.create.CreateIndexRequest.updateAllTypes​(boolean)
    useless with 6.x indices which may only have one type
    org.elasticsearch.action.admin.indices.create.CreateIndexRequestBuilder.setUpdateAllTypes​(boolean)
    useless with 6.x indices which may only have one type
    org.elasticsearch.action.admin.indices.create.CreateIndexResponse.isShardsAcked()
    use ShardsAcknowledgedResponse.isShardsAcknowledged()
    org.elasticsearch.action.admin.indices.mapping.put.PutMappingRequest.updateAllTypes​(boolean)
    useless with 6.x indices which may only have one type
    org.elasticsearch.action.admin.indices.mapping.put.PutMappingRequestBuilder.setUpdateAllTypes​(boolean)
    useless with 6.x indices which may only have one type
    org.elasticsearch.action.admin.indices.rollover.RolloverResponse.isShardsAcked()
    use ShardsAcknowledgedResponse.isShardsAcknowledged()
    org.elasticsearch.action.admin.indices.template.put.PutIndexTemplateRequestBuilder.setTemplate​(String)
    Replaced by PutIndexTemplateRequestBuilder.setPatterns(List)
    org.elasticsearch.action.bulk.Retry.withBackoff​(BiConsumer<BulkRequest, ActionListener<BulkResponse>>, BulkRequest, ActionListener<BulkResponse>, Settings)
    Prefer Retry.withBackoff(BiConsumer, BulkRequest, ActionListener). The Settings isn't used.
    org.elasticsearch.action.GenericAction.newResponse()
    Implement GenericAction.getResponseReader() instead and make this method throw an UnsupportedOperationException
    org.elasticsearch.action.get.GetResponse.iterator()
    Use GetResponse.getSource() instead
    org.elasticsearch.action.search.SearchRequestBuilder.fields​(String...)
    Use SearchRequestBuilder.storedFields(String...) instead.
    org.elasticsearch.action.support.master.TransportMasterNodeAction.newResponse()
    new implementors should override TransportMasterNodeAction.read(StreamInput) and use the Writeable.Reader interface.
    org.elasticsearch.action.termvectors.TermVectorsRequest.doc​(BytesReference, boolean)
    use TermVectorsRequest.doc(BytesReference, boolean, XContentType) to avoid content auto detection
    org.elasticsearch.action.update.UpdateRequest.addScriptParam​(String, Object)
    Use UpdateRequest.script(Script) instead
    org.elasticsearch.action.update.UpdateRequest.fields​(String...)
    Use UpdateRequest.fetchSource(String[], String[]) instead
    org.elasticsearch.action.update.UpdateRequest.script​(String, ScriptType)
    Use UpdateRequest.script(Script) instead
    org.elasticsearch.action.update.UpdateRequest.scriptLang​(String)
    Use UpdateRequest.script(Script) instead
    org.elasticsearch.action.update.UpdateRequest.scriptParams()
    Use UpdateRequest.script() instead
    org.elasticsearch.action.update.UpdateRequest.scriptString()
    Use UpdateRequest.script() instead
    org.elasticsearch.action.update.UpdateRequest.scriptType()
    Use UpdateRequest.script() instead
    org.elasticsearch.action.update.UpdateRequestBuilder.setFields​(String...)
    Use UpdateRequestBuilder.setFetchSource(String[], String[]) instead
    org.elasticsearch.client.Client.prepareTermVector()
    org.elasticsearch.client.Client.termVector​(TermVectorsRequest)
    org.elasticsearch.client.ClusterAdminClient.preparePutPipeline​(String, BytesReference)
    use ClusterAdminClient.preparePutPipeline(String, BytesReference, XContentType)
    org.elasticsearch.client.ClusterAdminClient.prepareSimulatePipeline​(BytesReference)
    org.elasticsearch.client.support.AbstractClient.prepareTermVector()
    org.elasticsearch.client.support.AbstractClient.termVector​(TermVectorsRequest)
    org.elasticsearch.cluster.ack.CreateIndexClusterStateUpdateResponse.isShardsAcked()
    use CreateIndexClusterStateUpdateResponse.isShardsAcknowledged()
    org.elasticsearch.common.geo.builders.ShapeBuilder.parse​(XContentParser)
    this method will be removed in a future version; use ShapeParser.parse instead
    org.elasticsearch.common.io.UTF8StreamWriter.setOutputStream​(OutputStream)
    Replaced by UTF8StreamWriter.setOutput(OutputStream)
    org.elasticsearch.common.network.NetworkUtils.sortAddresses​(List<InetAddress>)
    remove this when multihoming is really correct
    org.elasticsearch.common.settings.Settings.getAsBooleanLenientForPreEs6Indices​(Version, String, Boolean, DeprecationLogger)
    Only used to provide automatic upgrades for pre 6.0 indices.
    org.elasticsearch.common.time.DateMathParser.parse​(String, LongSupplier, boolean, DateTimeZone)
    org.elasticsearch.common.unit.ByteSizeValue.bytesAsInt()
    org.elasticsearch.common.util.LocaleUtils.parse5x​(String)
    org.elasticsearch.common.xcontent.XContentHelper.convertToJson​(BytesReference, boolean)
    org.elasticsearch.common.xcontent.XContentHelper.convertToMap​(BytesReference, boolean)
    this method relies on auto-detection of content type. Use XContentHelper.convertToMap(BytesReference, boolean, XContentType) instead with the proper XContentType
    org.elasticsearch.common.xcontent.XContentHelper.createParser​(NamedXContentRegistry, DeprecationHandler, BytesReference)
    use XContentHelper.createParser(NamedXContentRegistry, DeprecationHandler, BytesReference, XContentType) to avoid content type auto-detection
    org.elasticsearch.common.xcontent.XContentHelper.writeRawField​(String, BytesReference, XContentBuilder, ToXContent.Params)
    use XContentHelper.writeRawField(String, BytesReference, XContentType, XContentBuilder, Params) to avoid content type auto-detection
    org.elasticsearch.common.xcontent.XContentHelper.xContentType​(BytesReference)
    the content type should not be guessed except for few cases where we effectively don't know the content type. The REST layer should move to reading the Content-Type header instead. There are other places where auto-detection may be needed. This method is deprecated to prevent usages of it from spreading further without specific reasons.
    org.elasticsearch.ExceptionsHelper.detailedMessage​(Throwable)
    Don't swallow exceptions, allow them to propagate.
    org.elasticsearch.index.engine.Engine.delete​(Engine.DeleteByQuery)
    This was removed, but we keep this API so translog can replay any DBQs on upgrade.
    org.elasticsearch.index.engine.InternalEngine.delete​(Engine.DeleteByQuery)
    This was removed, but we keep this API so translog can replay any DBQs on upgrade.
    org.elasticsearch.index.fielddata.ScriptDocValues.Dates.getDate()
    org.elasticsearch.index.fielddata.ScriptDocValues.Dates.getDates()
    org.elasticsearch.index.fielddata.ScriptDocValues.Longs.getDate()
    org.elasticsearch.index.fielddata.ScriptDocValues.Longs.getDates()
    org.elasticsearch.index.mapper.FieldNamesFieldMapper.Builder.index​(boolean)
    org.elasticsearch.index.query.InnerHitBuilder.getFieldNames()
    Use InnerHitBuilder.getStoredFieldsContext() instead.
    org.elasticsearch.index.query.InnerHitBuilder.setFieldNames​(List<String>)
    Use InnerHitBuilder.setStoredFieldNames(List) instead.
    org.elasticsearch.index.query.MatchQueryBuilder.setLenient​(boolean)
    use #lenient() instead
    org.elasticsearch.index.query.MoreLikeThisQueryBuilder.ids​(String...)
    construct the items array externally and use it in the constructor / setter
    org.elasticsearch.index.query.MultiMatchQueryBuilder.useDisMax​(Boolean)
    use a tieBreaker of 1.0f to disable "dis-max" query or select the appropriate MultiMatchQueryBuilder.Type
    org.elasticsearch.index.query.QueryShardContext.isFilter()
    The distinction between query and filter context is removed in the next major version.
    org.elasticsearch.index.query.QueryStringQueryBuilder.autoGeneratePhraseQueries​(boolean)
    org.elasticsearch.index.query.QueryStringQueryBuilder.splitOnWhitespace​(boolean)
    org.elasticsearch.index.query.QueryStringQueryBuilder.useAllFields​(Boolean)
    org.elasticsearch.index.query.QueryStringQueryBuilder.useDisMax​(boolean)
    org.elasticsearch.index.query.SimpleQueryStringBuilder.useAllFields()
    org.elasticsearch.plugins.AnalysisPlugin.requriesAnalysisSettings​(AnalysisModule.AnalysisProvider<T>)
    use AnalysisPlugin.requiresAnalysisSettings(AnalysisProvider)
    org.elasticsearch.plugins.DiscoveryPlugin.getDiscoveryTypes​(ThreadPool, TransportService, NamedWriteableRegistry, MasterService, ClusterApplier, ClusterSettings, UnicastHostsProvider, AllocationService)
    Future versions will not support pluggable discovery implementations.
    org.elasticsearch.plugins.Plugin.onModule​(IndexModule)
    use #onIndexModule instead
    org.elasticsearch.script.JodaCompatibleZonedDateTime.getCenturyOfEra()
    org.elasticsearch.script.JodaCompatibleZonedDateTime.getDayOfWeek()

    org.elasticsearch.script.JodaCompatibleZonedDateTime.toString​(String)
    org.elasticsearch.search.aggregations.bucket.composite.CompositeValuesSourceBuilder.missing​(Object)
    Use CompositeValuesSourceBuilder.missingBucket(boolean) instead.
    org.elasticsearch.search.aggregations.metrics.cardinality.CardinalityAggregationBuilder.rehash​(boolean)
    no replacement - values will always be rehashed
    org.elasticsearch.search.aggregations.pipeline.PipelineAggregatorBuilders.movingAvg​(String, String)
    use PipelineAggregatorBuilders.movingFunction(String, Script, String, int) instead
    org.elasticsearch.search.sort.FieldSortBuilder.getNestedFilter()
    set nested sort with FieldSortBuilder.setNestedSort(NestedSortBuilder) and retrieve with FieldSortBuilder.getNestedSort()
    org.elasticsearch.search.sort.FieldSortBuilder.getNestedPath()
    set nested sort with FieldSortBuilder.setNestedSort(NestedSortBuilder) and retrieve with FieldSortBuilder.getNestedSort()
    org.elasticsearch.search.sort.FieldSortBuilder.setNestedFilter​(QueryBuilder)
    set nested sort with FieldSortBuilder.setNestedSort(NestedSortBuilder) and retrieve with FieldSortBuilder.getNestedSort()
    org.elasticsearch.search.sort.FieldSortBuilder.setNestedPath​(String)
    set nested sort with FieldSortBuilder.setNestedSort(NestedSortBuilder) and retrieve with FieldSortBuilder.getNestedSort()
    org.elasticsearch.search.sort.GeoDistanceSortBuilder.geohashes​(String...)
    org.elasticsearch.search.sort.GeoDistanceSortBuilder.getNestedFilter()
    set nested sort with GeoDistanceSortBuilder.setNestedSort(NestedSortBuilder) and retrieve with GeoDistanceSortBuilder.getNestedSort()
    org.elasticsearch.search.sort.GeoDistanceSortBuilder.getNestedPath()
    set nested sort with GeoDistanceSortBuilder.setNestedSort(NestedSortBuilder) and retrieve with GeoDistanceSortBuilder.getNestedSort()
    org.elasticsearch.search.sort.GeoDistanceSortBuilder.setNestedFilter​(QueryBuilder)
    set nested sort with GeoDistanceSortBuilder.setNestedSort(NestedSortBuilder) and retrieve with GeoDistanceSortBuilder.getNestedSort()
    org.elasticsearch.search.sort.GeoDistanceSortBuilder.setNestedPath​(String)
    set nested sort with GeoDistanceSortBuilder.setNestedSort(NestedSortBuilder) and retrieve with GeoDistanceSortBuilder.getNestedSort()
    org.elasticsearch.search.sort.ScriptSortBuilder.getNestedFilter()
    set nested sort with ScriptSortBuilder.setNestedSort(NestedSortBuilder) and retrieve with ScriptSortBuilder.getNestedSort()
    org.elasticsearch.search.sort.ScriptSortBuilder.getNestedPath()
    set nested sort with ScriptSortBuilder.setNestedSort(NestedSortBuilder) and retrieve with ScriptSortBuilder.getNestedSort()
    org.elasticsearch.search.sort.ScriptSortBuilder.setNestedFilter​(QueryBuilder)
    set nested sort with ScriptSortBuilder.setNestedSort(NestedSortBuilder) and retrieve with ScriptSortBuilder.getNestedSort()
    org.elasticsearch.search.sort.ScriptSortBuilder.setNestedPath​(String)
    set nested sort with ScriptSortBuilder.setNestedSort(NestedSortBuilder) and retrieve with ScriptSortBuilder.getNestedSort()
    org.elasticsearch.threadpool.Scheduler.schedule​(TimeValue, String, Runnable)
    use Scheduler.schedule(Runnable, TimeValue, String) instead
    org.elasticsearch.threadpool.ThreadPool.scheduleDeprecated​(TimeValue, String, Runnable)  
  • 构造器 
    构造器 说明
    org.elasticsearch.action.ingest.PutPipelineRequest​(String, BytesReference)
    use PutPipelineRequest(String, BytesReference, XContentType) to avoid content type auto-detection
    org.elasticsearch.action.ingest.PutPipelineRequestBuilder​(ElasticsearchClient, PutPipelineAction, String, BytesReference)
    org.elasticsearch.action.ingest.SimulatePipelineRequest​(BytesReference)
    use SimulatePipelineRequest(BytesReference, XContentType) that does not attempt content autodetection
    org.elasticsearch.action.ingest.SimulatePipelineRequestBuilder​(ElasticsearchClient, SimulatePipelineAction, BytesReference)
    use SimulatePipelineRequestBuilder(ElasticsearchClient, SimulatePipelineAction, BytesReference, XContentType) to avoid content type auto-detection on the source bytes
    org.elasticsearch.common.component.AbstractLifecycleComponent​(Settings)
    the settings parameters are not used, therefore the use of this constructor is deprecated. Going to be removed in subsequent versions. The parameterless constructor should be used instead.
    org.elasticsearch.common.settings.SecureString​(String)
    Only use for compatibility between deprecated string settings and new secure strings
  • 枚举常量 
    枚举常量 说明
    org.elasticsearch.action.search.SearchType.QUERY_AND_FETCH
    org.elasticsearch.index.translog.Translog.Operation.Type.CREATE
    org.elasticsearch.index.VersionType.FORCE
    this will be removed in 7.0 and should not be used! It is *ONLY* for backward compatibility with 5.0 indices
